pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'PubChem' Database for Chemical Data Retrieval // Provides an R interface to the 'PubChem' database, which is a repository for chemical information and a resource for finding chemical and biological data. The package simplifies the process of retrieving and handling chemical compound information from 'PubChem'. Users can search for compounds, retrieve standard chemical information, download data in various formats, and query the database using the 'PubChem' Power User Gateway (PUG) 'RESTful' API https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/docs/pug-rest. The package aims to facilitate the integration of chemical data in bioinformatics and cheminformatics workflows.
